\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 367}

\subsection*{Zero Logic Impairment}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{J. Doe}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Amanitas & plant material\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 0.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
This was supposed to be a below-threshold test, but ended up stronger than expected.



EFFECTS:

\item Relaxed but not `tired.' 

\item Flushed face (almost like having run around the block or something)  

\item Slight motor impairment (nothing `heavy,' but making typing a bit of a chore)  

\item Zero logic impairment (fully able to play logic games competitively, do math, etc.)  

\item Suggestibility (Easy to wander off into unsolicited conversation) 

\item Conversational weirdness (Difficulty picking `the right word' (A feeling of not being able to express oneself `properly.' nobody else noticed this however.)  

\item Minor hallucinosis (if you could call it that. he could not actually point out something and say, `there, \_that moved\_.' it just SEEMED like stuff was moving. note: there was an earthquake at about the time he was having such thoughts.)  



DURATION: 

no more than 6 or 7 hours.



COMMENTS: 

No hangover was noticed. Sleep came easily. dosage was taken pulverized in gelcaps with milkthistle.

\end{document}
